about.title: We are Carnot Research
about.subtitle: Everything About Us
about.whoWeAreDesc: We are Carnot Research, a deep-tech AI company founded by professors, scientists, and engineers from top IITs, driven by a common mission: to bridge cutting-edge research with real-world deployment. Our team brings together over 120 years of collective experience in AI, NLP, and systems engineering, backed by multiple patents and top-tier publications.
about.whoWeAreDesc2: We specialize in building trustworthy, secure, and high-impact AI systems — particularly for high-stakes sectors such as government, enterprise, and regulated industries.
about.whatWeDoDesc: At Carnot, we build and deploy secure, on-premise GenAI systems with a strong focus on:
about.whatWeDoItem1: Multimodal data ingestion (PDFs, web, YouTube, scanned docs)
about.whatWeDoItem2: LLM-based Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) with verifiable citations
about.whatWeDoItem3: Conversational AI with agentic workflows for governance and enterprises
about.whatWeDoItem4: Custom NLP and document intelligence solutions
about.whatWeDoItem5: LLM + VLM integration for visual reasoning and OCR-based tasks
about.whatWeDoItem6: Tech skilling and AI capability development for industry and public sector
about.whatWeDoDesc2: Our ability to conduct managed, deployable research sets us apart. We partner with organizations to convert deep-tech research into scalable tools, applications, and IP that directly serve strategic or operational needs.
about.missionDesc: Our mission is to enable responsible, domain-specific AI adoption across industries and governments. Whether it's powering public-facing governance chatbots, automating knowledge from policy documents, or deploying enterprise RAG systems — we deliver AI that works on-ground, at-scale, and in-context.
about.missionDesc2: Our core strengths lie in NLP, Vision-Language models, and agentic systems, with seamless linkages to IoT, Cybersecurity, and Blockchain where required. From startups to Fortune 500s to ministries, we are building the infrastructure for India's next leap in AI-driven transformation.

research.title: Research Areas
research.subtitle: We conduct research in primarily 2 areas.
research.nlp_p1: At Carnot Research, our NLP work focuses on building deployable, domain-specific language models that extract intelligence from unstructured, multilingual, and multimodal data — such as documents, web pages, audio, video, and scanned PDFs. Our goal is to make machines truly understand, reason with, and generate human language in contextually grounded, verifiable ways.
research.nlp_p2: We help organizations unlock insights from complex data — including policy documents, regulations, citizen queries, support tickets, contracts, feedback forms, and media content — powering more responsive, intelligent, and scalable systems.
research.nlp_qna_desc: Answer domain-specific queries with citations from trusted documents.
research.nlp_sum_desc: Generate concise, actionable summaries from long reports or policies.
research.nlp_stt_desc: Convert audio content (meetings, calls, citizen voices) into searchable transcripts.
research.nlp_ocr_desc: Digitize and understand scanned or handwritten documents using OCR + VLMs.
research.cv_desc: We use state of art approaches in computer vision and deep learning to help organizations extract, analyze and understand information from images & videos. By integrating computer vision technology into existing systems, organizations can automate and improve speed of various mechanical processes and also reduce operational costs. Our R&D team is constantly evaluating and testing latest approaches, taking on new client challenges in different areas.
research.cv_obj_det_desc: Pedestrian Detection, Medical Imaging, Image Search, Automatic Image Annotation, Object Counting.
research.cv_face_desc: Retail Crime Prevention, Smarter Advertising, Facial Biometrics, Automated Attendance.
research.cv_video_desc: Patient Monitoring, Predictive Maintenance, Store Heatmap, Surveillance, Autonomous Vehicles.
research.cv_activity_desc: Security & Surveillance, Fitness Tracking, Fall Detection, Elderly Care, Event Detection.
research.cv_emotion_desc: Market Research, e-Learning, Remote Elderly Care, Couselling, Driver Fatigue Monitoring.
research.cv_pose_desc: Gait/Posture Analysis, Animation, Gaming, Virtual/Augmented Reality, Surveillance.
research.cv_depth_desc: Robotics & Trajectory Estimation, Augmented Reality, Haze & Fog Removal.
research.cv_seg_desc: Bio-medical Image Diagnosis, Autonomous Driving, Satellite Image Processing, Precision Agriculture.
research.cv_tracking_desc: Sports Analytics, Human-Computer Interaction, Autonomous Driving, Surveillance.
research.nlp_ner_desc: Extract structured information like names, locations, and policies from text.
research.nlp_class_desc: Automatically tag and route documents based on content and intent.
research.nlp_intent_desc: Understand user goals in conversations for accurate routing and response.
research.nlp_multimodal_desc: Integrate text, image, speech, and video for richer AI-driven insights.
research.nlp_sentiment_desc: Extract opinions and trends from social, internal, and public feedback data.

service.contact_desc: Let's discuss how our services can help transform your organization.

ai_research.tagline: Turn cutting-edge AI research into real business impact.
ai_research.overview_desc: Our AI Research Consulting service helps companies understand, adopt, and integrate advanced AI technologies into their existing systems. We work with you to identify high-value AI opportunities, assess feasibility, and create an execution roadmap tailored to your industry.
ai_research.overview_desc2: We combine academic-level research depth with practical engineering execution, ensuring your AI initiatives are reliable, scalable, and future-proof.
ai_research.feature1_desc: Evaluate your organization's readiness for AI adoption and identify areas for improvement.
ai_research.feature2_desc: Conduct feasibility studies and develop prototypes to validate AI concepts and approaches.
ai_research.feature3_desc: Transform research prototypes into production-ready solutions with engineering excellence.
ai_research.feature4_desc: Create comprehensive AI roadmaps aligned with your business strategy and objectives.
ai_research.feature5_desc: Audit and optimize AI models for performance, accuracy, and efficiency.

innovation.tagline: Continuous innovation delivered as an on-demand service.
innovation.overview_desc: With Managed Innovation-as-a-Service, we become your dedicated innovation partner—handling research, rapid prototyping, and technology exploration while you focus on your core business. This service ensures your organisation stays ahead of competitors through ongoing experimentation and technical discovery.
innovation.overview_desc2: We take responsibility for identifying new technologies, validating ideas, and building proof-of-concepts that convert into production-ready solutions.
innovation.feature1_desc: Regular research sprints to explore new technologies and validate innovative ideas.
innovation.feature2_desc: Build proof-of-concepts and product prototypes to validate concepts and demonstrate feasibility.
innovation.feature3_desc: Track and validate AI/ML experiments to identify promising approaches and solutions.
innovation.feature4_desc: Scout for emerging technologies and develop innovation strategies aligned with your goals.
innovation.feature5_desc: Access a dedicated innovation team on a subscription basis for continuous innovation support.

llm.tagline: Build LLMs tailored to your domain, data, and workflows.
llm.overview_desc: We design and deploy custom Large Language Models and Gen-AI systems that understand your business language, improve productivity, and automate complex workflows. Whether you need a domain-specific LLM, RAG system, or fine-tuned foundation model, we provide end-to-end development.
llm.overview_desc2: Our solutions deliver higher accuracy, reduced hallucinations, and tighter security compared to generic AI tools.
llm.feature1_desc: Train and fine-tune language models specific to your domain and use cases.
llm.feature2_desc: Build retrieval-augmented generation systems with your enterprise knowledge base.
llm.feature3_desc: Deploy models at scale with high availability and performance optimization.
llm.feature4_desc: Optimize prompts for maximum accuracy and efficiency in your applications.
llm.feature5_desc: Flexible deployment options to meet your security and compliance requirements.

multimodal.tagline: Unify text, images, audio, and video into structured insights.
multimodal.overview_desc: Modern businesses deal with multiple data formats. We build multimodal data ingestion pipelines that clean, structure, and process all types of data—text documents, PDFs, videos, images, speech, and logs—into AI-ready formats.
multimodal.overview_desc2: Our workflows ensure high-accuracy extraction, metadata tagging, and indexing for powerful analytics and Gen-AI applications.
multimodal.feature1_desc: Extract text and insights from images, videos, and scanned documents.
multimodal.feature2_desc: Convert audio content into searchable, structured text formats.
multimodal.feature3_desc: Extract and enrich metadata for better organization and searchability.
multimodal.feature4_desc: Process large volumes of documents efficiently and accurately.
multimodal.feature5_desc: Transform data into vector embeddings for semantic search and AI applications.

conversational.tagline: AI agents that understand, reason, and take actions for you.
conversational.overview_desc: We create intelligent conversational agents and autonomous AI systems that handle complex tasks, workflows, and decision-making. From customer support bots to internal enterprise agents, our systems deliver natural dialogue and operational efficiency.
conversational.overview_desc2: Using LLMs, RAG, and tool-calling, our AI agents can access databases, perform actions, schedule tasks, and integrate with your existing apps.
conversational.feature1_desc: Build intelligent chatbots and virtual assistants for customer support and internal operations.
conversational.feature2_desc: Develop autonomous AI agents that can make decisions and take actions independently.
conversational.feature3_desc: Integrate AI agents with your existing workflows and CRM systems for seamless operations.
conversational.feature4_desc: Build systems where multiple AI agents work together to solve complex problems.
conversational.feature5_desc: Deploy conversational AI systems with enterprise-grade security and compliance.

vision.tagline: Transform visual data into actionable intelligence.
vision.overview_desc: We build computer vision AI models that understand images and videos with exceptional accuracy. Our solutions support industries like manufacturing, retail, surveillance, healthcare, logistics, and real estate with real-time recognition, detection, and analytics.
vision.overview_desc2: Whether it's defect detection, face anonymisation, or object tracking—we deliver production-ready vision pipelines.
vision.feature1_desc: Detect and identify objects and faces in images and videos with high accuracy.
vision.feature2_desc: Classify images and perform semantic segmentation for detailed analysis.
vision.feature3_desc: Analyze video streams to recognize activities and detect events in real-time.
vision.feature4_desc: Extract text and information from documents, forms, and images using OCR technology.
vision.feature5_desc: Deploy computer vision models on edge devices for real-time, low-latency processing.

nlp.tagline: Extract intelligence from unstructured text with precision.
nlp.overview_desc: Our NLP & Document Intelligence solutions convert unstructured documents—PDFs, emails, contracts, forms, and reports—into structured insights. We specialise in domain-specific NLP systems that provide high accuracy in extraction and summarisation.
nlp.overview_desc2: Ideal for enterprises dealing with large volumes of text that need automation and intelligent processing.
nlp.feature1_desc: Automatically process and extract information from documents with high accuracy.
nlp.feature2_desc: Summarize documents and extract key entities, relationships, and insights.
nlp.feature3_desc: Analyze contracts and documents for compliance, risk, and key terms.
nlp.feature4_desc: Enable semantic search and automatic classification of documents and text.
nlp.feature5_desc: Train custom NLP models tailored to your specific domain and use cases.

edge.tagline: Deploy real-time AI where latency and bandwidth matter.
edge.overview_desc: We bring AI capabilities to edge devices—cameras, sensors, microcontrollers, and industrial hardware. Our solutions reduce cloud dependency, improve response times, and optimise costs.
edge.overview_desc2: Perfect for manufacturing plants, smart cities, logistics systems, and energy management environments.
edge.feature1_desc: Optimize and quantize AI models for efficient deployment on edge devices.
edge.feature2_desc: Process and analyze data from IoT sensors in real-time at the edge.
edge.feature3_desc: Deploy computer vision and NLP models directly on embedded devices.
edge.feature4_desc: Detect anomalies and issues in real-time without cloud connectivity.
edge.feature5_desc: Build hybrid architectures that combine edge processing with cloud intelligence.

skilling.tagline: Upskill teams to adopt and build AI-driven products.
skilling.overview_desc: We offer structured training programs designed to upgrade your team's AI, ML, and engineering capabilities. Our modules are customised based on the skill level of your organisation—beginner, intermediate, or advanced.
skilling.overview_desc2: Hands-on workshops, live projects, and industry-expert sessions ensure your team becomes self-sufficient in modern AI technologies.
skilling.feature1_desc: Comprehensive training programs covering AI and machine learning fundamentals and advanced topics.
skilling.feature2_desc: Specialized training on Large Language Models and Generative AI technologies.
skilling.feature3_desc: Hands-on workshops on Computer Vision, NLP, and MLOps practices.
skilling.feature4_desc: Intensive bootcamp-style training programs tailored for corporate teams.
skilling.feature5_desc: Learn by doing with real-world projects and case studies.
